name: Flying Turkey
description: Welcome to Flying Turkey!!! In here, You must defend the platform and stop turkeys getting away. Have you ever try to use an ice cream to strike turkeys away? Or use a frog-glove to launch turkeys? There is a great variety of turkeys and weapons waiting for you to explore. Just have a blast!!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 4GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-7700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
